title: Simpson's Christmas special; Bart gets an F.
brief_description: In “The Simpsons Christmas Special” the family Christmas money has to be spent removing Bart’s tattoo. Homer attempts to find extra work in order to buy the Christmas gifts the family are demanding. In “Bart gets an F”, Bart is in danger of repeating fourth grade because of his inability to pass the exams. His hilarious attempts to hoodwink his teachers makes for a very entertaining episode of “The Simpsons”.
